articles.summary: The SEC and FINRA are investigating unusual stock surges linked to crypto deals. Over 200 stocks have experienced such surges in the last few months. The SEC is looking into the matter.    - FINRA and SEC are investigating the matter, as well.

articles.title: Strategy Buys 196 Bitcoin for $22.1M
articles.author: Coin Desk
articles.summary: Strategy bought 196 BTC for $22.1 million on Monday. The latest purchase was made at an average price of $113,048 per BTC. Strategy now has 640,031 BTC in its total holdings.    The company's total holdings are worth $1.2 billion.

articles.title: Turkey to empower watchdog to freeze crypto accounts in AML crackdown: Report
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Turkey plans new legislation letting Masak freeze crypto accounts to fight money laundering. It will align with FATF standards, according to Masak's proposal. Masak is a member of the Turkish parliament. He is also a former president of Masak Party.

articles.title: Binance Unveils "Crypto-as-a-Service," Paving the Way for Institutional Crypto Adoption
articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: Binance has officially launched its "Crypto-as-a-Service" (CaaS) offering. CaaS is a white-label product designed to integrate cryptocurrency trading into financial institutions' existing services. Binance is the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange.

articles.title: MicroStrategy Doubles Down on Bitcoin as 'Buyers in Stress' Sentiment Emerges
articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: MicroStrategy bought 196 Bitcoin for $22.1 million between September 22 and September 25th. MicroStrategy is committed to Bitcoin and wants to stay on top of Bitcoin's development.      Â   - MSTR's website.

articles.title: Kazakhstan Launches Alem Crypto Fund at AIFC, Taps Binance for Custody
articles.author: Bitcoin
articles.summary: Kazakhstan's new Alem Crypto Fund is live. Astana wants to treat digital assets like a treasury tool and treat them like a currency.   Â      in Kazakhstani currency is called the "Alem".

articles.title: Qatar bank taps JPMorgan's blockchain for faster US dollar payments
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: QNB's shift to Kinexys blockchain enables near-instant, 24/7 payments. It's a treasurer's dream, says QNB's Kamel Moris, the bank's chief executive officer. He was speaking at a conference organized by QNB.

articles.title: China Launches Digital Yuan International Hub to Spur Cross-Border Use
articles.author: Liu Ran
articles.summary: China has officially launched an international operations center for its digital yuan in Shanghai. The center began operations on Sept. 24 and introduced three business platforms focused on cross-border digital payments, blockchain services, and digital assets. Lu Lei, a deputy governor of the People's Bank of China (PBOC), said the central bank is committed to offering open and innovative solutions to improve global cross- border payments.
